headline.main: Times Sq. Landmark Returns in Puff of Smoke

docs.abstract: Article on R J Reynolds Tobacco Co ad for Winston cigarettes in Times Sq, NYC; ad, which depicts smoker puffing 'smoke' rings from sign on Broadway, is replacement for similar sign that advertised Camels; illus

keywords.value: TOBACCO, TOBACCO PRODUCTS AND SMOKERS ARTICLES
keywords.name: subject

docs.lead_paragraph: Times Square, which kicked the smoking habit six years ago, has started puffing again -- and this time twice as much.
docs.snippet: Times Square, which kicked the smoking habit six years ago, has started puffing again -- and this time twice as much.
